vaqpack.data

Class VP_DataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • vaqpack.data.VP_DataManager

  • public class VP_DataManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores the data nodes (XML) as built or loaded by the user.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Constructor Summary

        public void retrieveAdmin()
                   throws java.io.IOException,

                          javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                          javax.crypto.BadPaddingException

      • searchForVPAdmin

        public boolean searchForVPAdmin()
                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Calls findAdminUser() of the Database Manager.
        Returns:
        Boolean value indicating whether or not a VaqPack administrator user has been created and exists in the database user table. This is necessary in case the user cancels or the program exists in the middle of first-run initialization.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        Since:
        1.0

      • createVPAdmin

        public boolean createVPAdmin(java.lang.String[] cred)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException,
                             java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                             java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Calls createVaqPackAdmin() of the Database Manager.
        Parameters:
        cred - String array of the database administrator user credentials and the VaqPack administrator user credentials.
        Returns:
        Boolean value indicating if the database administrator user is valid, allowing the creation of this VP administrator user account.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Since:
        1.0

      • userLogin

        public int userLogin(java.lang.String[] cred)
              throws java.sql.SQLException,
                     java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                     java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Calls hashPassword() and then sends it to the Database Manager with attemptUserLogin(). If all is well, a new VP_User is created.
        Parameters:
        cred - String array of user credentials.
        Returns:
        An integer that is returned from attemptUserLogin().
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Since:
        1.0

      • resendAccess

        public void resendAccess(java.lang.String[] cred)
                  throws java.sql.SQLException,
                         java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                         java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Calls hashPassword() and then sends it to the Database Manager with resendUserAccessCode(). If the entered user email exists in the database, an email is sent containing a new registration access code generated by generatAccessCode().
        Parameters:
        cred - String array of user credentials.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Since:
        1.0

      • findUserForReset

        public int findUserForReset(java.lang.String email)
                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        Calls generatAccessCode() and then sends it to the Database Manager along with the user email through findUserOrRegUserForReset(). If the entered user email exists in the database, and if the user has not reset their password in over 24 hours, an email is sent containing the code.
        Parameters:
        email - String of the user email address.
        Returns:
        The integer returned by findUserOrRegUserForReset().
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        Since:
        1.0

      • checkCurrentPassword

        public boolean checkCurrentPassword(java.lang.String password)
                             throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                    java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                    java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Calls checkPassword() and them sends it to the Database Manager. Checks if user's password exists in the database.
        Parameters:
        password - String of user password.
        Returns:
        Boolean from checkPassword() indicating if password string was found in the database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Since:
        1.0

      • regUser

        public int regUser(java.lang.String[] cred)
            throws java.sql.SQLException,
                   java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                   java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Calls hashPassword() and generateCode() then sends these values to the Database Manager using registerUser() along with the user credentials. If the user is new, an email is sent containing the access code.
        Parameters:
        cred - String array of user credentials.
        Returns:
        An integer value that is returned from registerUser().
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Since:
        1.0

        Parameters:
        email - String of email address to test.
        Returns:
        Boolean value indicating if the string parameter is a well-formed email address.

      • sendAttachments

        public void sendAttachments(java.lang.String email,
                            boolean sendResHTML,
                            boolean sendResPDF,
                            boolean sendBCHTML,
                            boolean sendBCPDF,
                            boolean sendCLHTML,
                            boolean sendCLPDF)
                     throws java.sql.SQLException,
                            java.io.IOException
        Determines which VaqPack documents to send as email attachments.
        Parameters:
        email - String of recipient email address.
        sendResHTML - Boolean to send Resume in HTML.
        sendResPDF - Boolean to send Resume in PDF.
        sendBCHTML - Boolean to send Business Card in HTML.
        sendBCPDF - Boolean to send Business Card in PDF.
        sendCLHTML - Boolean to send Cover Letter in HTML.
        sendCLPDF - Boolean to send Cover Letter in PDF.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.io.IOException
        Since:
        1.0
